description.en:
Adel specializes in technology-driven, community-based projects with an emphasis on blockchain. From financial gaming platforms to blockchain incubators, we strive to improve and empower our end users, by providing unique and progressive ideas, powered by strong and reliable technology.

The Adelphoi cryptocurrency was created to support our community, our guiding principle.

ADL can be used not only to facilitate internal transactions within our community but also to give members additional benefits while using AdelTrade and Adel products."
